Headline: #34 South Michigan & #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at Michigan/111th
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan & 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 113th, State, 110th, Michigan due to, street blocakge near Michigan/111th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan & #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 113th, State, 110th, Michigan due to, street blocakge near Michigan/111th. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 69th. 

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
